item.description:
Master Intuitive Susan Sloane will teach tools and techniques to clear and protect your self, children, home and workspace of fear, negativity, entities, and more. Susan will guide you, step-by-step, with methods to take you through this Great Shift we are in, with ease.

$22 includes materials.

One scholarship available (attend free), call Susan early to apply 978 413 4308.

Visit susansloane.wordpress.com

People who attended this class said: “I give this class a 10. My vibration, energy, and life force feel completely elevated into a new dimension. I feel totally vibrant and renewed.” “Very informative, valuable info. Enjoyed it very much. A 10.” “I really enjoyed the class – thank you! I give it a 10.”
item.how_to_find_us: Please check Directions page at www.eternal-balance.com if you have not been to the studio before.
item.name: Clear & Protect Your Energy Field (Aura)
